title: Circus Winter Skills classes start Monday; Alumni show planned
content:
Big plans are in the works for the Peru Amateur Circus. 
  
Starting on Monday, Winter Circus Skills classes will be offered to both members of the general public looking to pick up a new skill as well as current performers hoping to brush up on their talents. And preparation is underway for circus-hosted Alumni Show, set for Dec.12 to raise funds for circus operations.
